document.full_text: toyota motor co  may have to change its u.s. sales targets because of production slowdowns in japan and north america, the u.s. sales chief of the world's largest automaker said on tuesday.
document.title: toyota may shift u.s. sales goals due to japan
lines_and_colors: toyota motor co  may have to change its u.s. sales targets because of production slowdowns in japan and north america, the u.s. sales chief of the world's largest automaker said on tuesday.
